org.fluidity.features

Interface DynamicConfiguration<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the settings interface type to implement.

    public interface DynamicConfiguration<T>
    Configuration that is periodically updated. This is a wrapper around Configuration that periodically refreshes the snapshot of the settings object. The methods of the settings interface, if used with this variant of the configuration mechanism, may not have any parameters.

    The granularity of the updates can be configured by implementing a PropertyProvider component that returns a valid number for the CONFIGURATION_REFRESH_PERIOD key. The default period granularity is 30 seconds.

    See Configuration for details on configuration.

    Usage

     @Component
 public final class MyComponent {

   private final Supplier<Settings> configuration;

   MyComponent(final ReloadingConfiguration<Settings> configuration) {
     this.configuration = configuration.snapshot();
   }

   public void someMethod() {
     final Settings settings = configuration.get();
     …
   }

   interface Settings {
     …
   }
 }
